Working for a greater means.
“The art of medicine consists of amusing the patient while nature cures the disease.” - Voltaire
Has caught at least three fish, that's three times as much as the average citizen.
Knows what a pearl looks like, unlike the last guy.
Can't imagine life without his ankles wet.
Sometimes forgets he's got actual legs.
Has sailed seven seas pursuing the mighty beasts.
The crew knows him as Steel Lungs.
Her fellow sailors swear she grows gills in the water.
The relentless Captain of the Pequed who took his crew to the ends of the earth in his pursuit to catch the greatest whale alive.
Only needs a nice pebble, a hook and some schnapps to make you an earring.
Hard not to be dazzled by her workshop.
Has seen colours you would never imagine in stone.
Doesn't even bother with anything less than 15 carats.
The incredible jeweller of queens. Entire fleets have sailed from every corner of the world for just one his dream-like tiaras.
Likes making bread.
Never forgets to bring a nice tray of cupcakes for everyone.
You would never believe what she can do with the right piping bag.
If you can stand his infamous temper, he'll make your palate dance.
His name is known in every royal court in the world. Those who can afford a taste from his exquisite spécialités claim that it's like taking a bite out of heaven.
His voice cheers even the laziest of workers.
A faint smell of dry leaves follows him wherever he goes.
Can identify every cigar brand in the Old World by their smoke alone.
Her exquisite hand-rolled cigars have ended lifelong rivalries.
The gentle Habano magnate that took his workers across the ocean and founded the flourishing cigar manufacturing town of Vincencity.
The stuff she makes would make a pirate gag.
Spends most of his time underground amid barrels.
His rum sells great in hospitals.
Prides on being able to taste the difference between Chardonnay champagne and the stuff they sell at the local pub.
Has served all kinds of people, from fancy investors to coarse sailors.
Knows every fermented and distilled beverage worth knowing in every continent.
The grand entrepreneur that took the delicacies of wine to new lands and established a flourishing enterprise.
Can carry a big bucket.
Helped put out four fires, driving the fire truck.
Has burning coals for breakfast.
Singled-handedly saved five people from the Great Sawmill Fire.
The great headchief that commanded the legendary Dragon Slayers Brigade for more than thirty years.
Has some very persuasive tricks in his holster.
Could sell a nut shell for the price of a schooner.
Knows about every boat that comes in and out of her jurisdiction.
Local producers refer to him as The Shield.
The ultimate defender of national self-sufficiency, whose economical reforms brought prosperity to an entire nation.
He can get you a glass of beer, just don't ask when was the last time it was rinsed.
Nothing like a stew and a home-made brew to forget about the roaches.
Not a bitter soul in the world that his fishpies can't comfort.
To this day, no one has passed through his threshold and left without a contented grin on their face.
Founder of the Black Bull, the greatest pub of all time. His unbelievable brews and unbeatable hospitality are known all over the continent.
Can tell when the 'H' is silent.
Can rarely be seen in the sunlight, mostly with her nose buried deep into a book.
Her strong voice inspires detailed images in her students' minds.
Has travelled the world researching the mysteries of ancient civilizations.
The acclaimed scientist who unveiled a reality invisible to human eyes, revolutionizing medicine, physics and chemistry forever.
Could tell you a couple of good places to spend the night, for the right tip.
With her help, anyone can discover every precious little corner of the city.
She was but eight years old when she led her first tour for visitors.
Thanks to his passion for both sailing and touring, his ferry company became renowned all across the country.
She founded the first travel agency, spreading her love for tourism to every corner of the world.
Born and raised in the fields.
Can carry half of her own body weight on her head.
Prides on being able to pick five tobacco leaves with a single move of the wrist.
Can't stand the feeling of not having dirt under his fingernails.
Has grown fifteen different species of tobacco plants in his back yard.
Got up on a tree as a kid and decided that was what she wanted to do for a living.
Her gentle respect for flora led her to devote her entire life to studying and growing all sorts of plants.
Has made an art of the cultivation of trees and plants, his flowering trees are considered living sculptures.
The director of the Botanical Garden who travelled throughout the whole continent to develop his meticulous and famous taxonomy, Flora of the Eastern Islands.
Smells like barnacles.
Has a keen eye for schooners.
A true authority on sailships.
One of the first hydraulic engineers to ever design a steamship.
The eminent naval architect who designed the Great Eastern, the largest ship ever built.
Makes damn good boilers.
Years of welding left her half blind, but she doesn't need her eyes much.
Has spent enough of his days at the foundry to know the casting process by heart.
He made swords when other kids were still playing with them.
His powerful hammer strikes gained him the nickname of Iron Arm.
Burning both her hands on an accident couldn't dissuade her from becoming the Master of the Forges.
The outstanding inventor that reshaped the process of steelmaking, becoming one of the most important innovators of the century.
People often mistake him for one of the apes.
Always barefoot.
Even the fiercest beast calms down in her presence.
For months she slept among the wolves, studying their behaviour, to the point where they accepted her as part of the pack.
The brilliant biologist that uncovered the realities of evolution and natural selection, defying all prior beliefs.
Remembers to say his prayers every night.
Can always spare a moment for those in need.
Her godly voice inspires courage in the hearts of her community.
The passion with which he preaches has united entire districts.
With great effort, he brought a new dawn to the Church and redefined its position in these critical modern times.
Sickly from birth, she experienced visions from a very young age.
Can wrap bandages efficiently tight.
Nothing that a good bloodletting can't fix.
Specialises in diagnosis and infectious diseases.
One of the brilliant minds that made ether anaesthesia safe for surgery.
Thanks to his exceptional research on vaccination and bacteriology, millions of lives have and will be saved all over the world.
A military surgeon not only concerned with the well being of wounded soldiers.
People laugh at him more than they laugh with him.
Has perfected the art of knock-knock jokes.
The theatre gets crowded every evening she's on stage.
Her acting makes even the coldest heart wrench.
The Queen of the Pose and the Princess of the Gesture, has toured around the world and starred on one of the first motion pictures.
He would rather be around trees than around people.
Forever covered in soot.
Smells of gunpowder.
Knows every path in the woods like the back of his hand.
The backbone of the industrial revolution.
Mind your step when you go for a walk in the forest.
Will protect even the tiniest bud with his life.
Deeply respects the might of the wildlife.
The mysterious guardian that dwells in the heart of the forest and knows every secret of Nature.
Always wears a fierce-looking fur cloak from a wolf he killed with his bare hands.
The renowned director of the Forest Academy, her unique understanding of Nature gained her international fame.
His greatest accomplishment in life was a foot sized potato.
Wakes up at dawn every day.
Her feet smell fruity.
Claims that no machine could ever do a better job than he does.
Grows the glossier red peppers.
Never needs a doctor, for he drinks a glass a day.
Thanks to her home-made fertilisers, event the clumsiest farmer can grow beautiful hops.
His studies on soil have increased the productivity on the whole district.
Her love for watching over crops as they sprout and grow ultimately turned her into one of the most respected authorities on agriculture.
Passionately believes in what technological advancements can do for agriculture.
Studied physics, chemistry and biology and travelled the Old World to come up with the most innovative farming solutions of the century.
His talent for crawling through tiny spaces finally got him a job.
His findings of oil deposits are more due to luck than expertise.
One of the toughest men on earth, or rather under it.
Her hands are a bit slippery, but she does a good job.
Thanks to his mastery on dynamite, he can create sturdy mining structures fast.
Has greatly improved her colleagues' chances of not being buried alive.
The man that first spotted gold on a riverbed and unleashed the great Gold Rush that attracted miners and prospectors from all over the globe.
She can fix anything with a fountain pen and a paper clip.
Once a top-performing member of the Royal Police Service, was fired for making his colleagues look bad by comparison.
The finest officer of her year.
The greatest mind in the force.
Her thirst for adventures is neverending.
His passion for History has brought him to every corner of the globe.
Transforms litterally your fur factory into a general cloth manufacture, using iron structures and basic wool to produce the best articles.
What is a ship without its captain?
What is a ship without its captain?
Loves rum and has got what it takes to live like a captain!
Has a famous ancestor and an aversion against driftwood.
A man of god and spiritual backbone of any expedition. You never know when you need one.
"There is nothing more unaesthetic than a policeman." ― Arthur Conan Doyle
"There is nothing more unaesthetic than a policeman." ― Arthur Conan Doyle
Commissioner Edd refers to himself as "the law".
In 400 nautical miles, turn left.
In 400 nautical miles, turn left.
Travelled the seas her whole live to visit the homeland of her name giving ancestor.
An apple a day keeps the doctor away.
An apple a day keeps the doctor away.
Sometimes you just need to call the gal.
Sometimes you just need to call the guy.
Master of modern traps and guns.
Silent, adaptive, fast. No animal can escape this hunter.
Master of modern traps and guns.
Professional big game hunter who spent most of his life in southern Africa. An outdoorsman who finds cities and temperate climates unbearable. Very diplomatic toward indigenous peoples.
A professional artist with words.
Better with words than weapons.
As scion of an old noble family and youngest of nine siblings he quickly learned the subtleties of diplomacy.

It is the master of expeditions, the eloquent, the strong and the mighty, they who is never lost, the savior of bodies, souls and things, the predator, the friend of man and animal, the puppetmaster, scourge of the sea, explorer of depths, the joker, the tomb raider, the cosmopolitan, the Jack of all traits.
Piece of wood, bearing the name of the sunken ship.
Enough for several harvests.
With these wheels on, your carts will barely notice any bothersome muddy potholes or loose cobblestones.
Your transportations can now catch up with the industrial race thanks to these steam powered carts! Only a little more expensive to maintain, but very fancy indeed!
Steam is old news! Electricity is the NEW new scientific revolution of the century! Implement Tilbury's line of electric carts and banish costly labour to the past!
Iron Framings greartly reinforce your building's structures to reduce the risk of fire catching up, so you can catch a breather!
Terrible infernos or ugly metal structures? You don't need to choose! These Cast-Iron Doric Columns will help prevent potential fires while still looking beautiful.
You want a glowing city, only not from conflagrations? Our Iron-and-Glass Magical Fire-Proof Architecture will stop any fire demons in their tracks and shimmer like a heaven made of glass!
Need something to call your workforce back to toil? With some extra care, this old bell should do the trick.
Your workers have trouble remembering the end of lunch time? Stop the slackers' moans with this Iron Factory Bell and get them to work already!

Thanks to the Oxford Electric Bell you can forget about shirkers forever! The still running clock will only require a power outlet to keep track of your workforce hours, ensuring they will not miss a single minute of their shift!
Need power but there's no powerplant in sight? That is exactly what dynamos were invented for! Disclaimer: may occasionally combust.
Generate stable electricity anywhere! Our Steam Turbines will safely and conveniently power up your buildings wherever they are, no connection to electricity towers required!
Piersons annouces his latest invention: the Turbo Generator! Its innovative system of turbine stages guarantees the highest safety, efficiency and power supply the market has to offer!
Your metallurgical industries need a boost? For only a little more damage to the environment, this calciner will improve the refining process.
Your heavy industries will revere this furnace! An advanced smelting process that will make your produce much sturdier and your workers' lives much easier.
Pricey molten processes are a thing of the past now thanks to the Bessamer converter, a furnace that will increase the scale and speed of your heavy industries' production like nothing ever before!
Need extra help in your processing factories? For a small cost, a planer will make metal cutting faster and enhance production.
Tired of wasting time on metal cutting? Upgrade your processing industries with a helical planer and speed up this annoying task!
You've never seen a faster metal cutting machine! Implement The Cutting Edge now in your processing factories and let electricity do all the work!
Put this millstone to work and lift that one from around your neck!
This French Burrstone will pulverise all your grinding issues to a fine, delicate mist!
The fantastic Grinding Machine Lieberman can grind anything and everything in a matter of seconds! The ultimate addition to your milling factories!
Precise chemical processing calls for precise measuring equipment, like this mercury thermometer.
Another ruined batch in your chemical processing factories? This advanced melting point apparatus will rid your clueless workforce of having to guess the temperature ever again.

As far as temperature measuring tools go, no other matches the precision of the Thiele Tube. The frighteningly accurate system will ensure your chemical processing factories perform at frighteningly productive rates.
If your wood production is see-sawing, see to it with this bow saw.
Nothing brings two people together as sharing a two-man saw. Bonding while working works for all of the parts involved!
Why do it by hand when the Vaughan Drag Saw can do it for you? Using nothing but electricity, this unbelievable automatic saw can cut five times faster than any hand saw!
Set this trap and leave it overnight. Chances are you'll find something the next day. Then again, maybe you won't.
Some might call it cruelty, we like to call it effective! No beast, big or small, can evade the toothy grip of this leghold trap, and your hunters don't need to move a muscle.
Have a case of scrawny hares? Say goodbye to your hairy problems! This fur stretcher will immensely increase the fur surface of even the tiniest of prey!
Woods taking up too much land? Keep your groves at bay with these secateurs.
Want to increase your woods' efficiency, but reduce their area? You don't have to choose thanks to these convenient loppers.
Introducing the Original Lowe! The most advanced pruning tool that can cut cleanly and with barely any effort thanks to its anvil system! Your woodlands have never been more efficient!
Are your farms in need of some fresh air? This plough can give your soil a breather.
This cast steel plough can multiply the toil of one farmer by four, so they have more time for sowing and tending to crops.
Welcome to the 19th Century, when machines can do all the work for you! These steel seed drills sow your crops faster, more efficiently and probably better than any human being can.
Wood ash might not be the most glamurous fertilizer out there, but still effectively reduces the required soil for your crops.
Can't spare any more room for crops? These chemically developed fertilizers have been designed to extend your soil's potential to the full.
You will not believe your eyes after applying our Superphosphate fertilizers to your farms: crops will sprout from your soil like it's the Garden of Eden!
Bony livestock? With these vitamins, your animals should be nice and round in no time.
No one wants animals to die… At least, not ahead of time! Prevent sickly livestock from succumbing to disease with these antibiotics.
Lost count of how many livestock assets you have lost to anthrax? This vaccine will ultimately get rid of the bug and protect animals, population and investments alike.
You have no more space to leave your livestock strolling around? You can now cram them all up in these stables!
Your livestock won't want to go anywhere else—nor will they be able to in these fully equipped barns!

Still treating your livestock like living beings? You can leave that in the past and make sure they are productively fat and packed into the tiniest space possible thanks to these revolutionary feedlots!
Can't stand the stench of your livestock farms? This will keep it covered and contained.
Manage your livestock waste in a clean and sustainable way by burying everything under this cover. The peak of hygiene!
As elegant as waste management gets, this straw-mixed compost shed will cover the stench of your animal farms, leaving behind only green meadows and fresh air.
Your miners won't stop complaining? Add this freight elevator to lift their spirits.
This steam-geared elevator that can lift up to ten tons in one go is the perfect addition to your mining industries.
Simon's latest elevator will dramatically reshape your mining scene! Performing solely on electricity, it has no rival amidst neither man nor steam-fueled machinery of its kind.
Easy to operate by even the dimmest miner, this medium-sized auger is a very useful addition to your quarries' equipment.
Make a dent in your quarry industries with this steam-powered drill press that will easily bore through every kind of terrain.
This drilling rig's powerful electric motor allows it to bore into the Earth's surface like no other machine ever created before.
Is your cloth production fraying? Your weavers will be able to operate this mechanical loom even in their sleep!
Weaving by hand belongs in the past! With the appropriate power source and correct human supervision, these power looms can weave faster than the best knitter!
The speed of a machine, the care of a master crafter! Easy to adjust and powered by electricity, the Roberts Loom is the fastest, most reliable weaving machinery even conceived!
Disarray reigns in your assembly factories? Put everything back in line with this steam-powered conveyor belt.
Haven't you heard? The assembly line is the manufacturing process of the future! This one is powered by electricity and incredibly dynamic!
The Industrial Revolution is here! With this entirely mechanised factory, you will set a new landmark for mass-production assembly factories!
Is your gastronomy a little bland? This oven should spice up your cooking factories.
Heat up your local cuisine with this fancy cast iron stove, fit for the needs of every delicious treat-making factory.
Thermo-Electrical cooking made easier than ever with the all-electric Smith stove, the latest revolution in cuisine that will make every mouth water!
Are your beverage industries stagnating? This brew kettle will make your concoction process all the more bearable.
All you need to add a spark to your beverages is this steam-powered brewing machine! The shelves will soon be flooded!
Get your drinks flowing with this electric pump! Its system will not only accelerate the process greatly, but improve the resulting quality as well!
Lose sight of tiny beads and pieces no more using this magnifying glass.
This precision monocular allows your watchmakers to see every tiny tooth and detail, making detailed crafting both painless and flawless.
The most comfortable, precise and agile magnifying glass of all, specially fitted for the purpose of handling the smallest, most delicate of materials in watchmaking and jewelling.
Use this net to comb the waters and watch as your buckets of fish simply multiply.
Tired of waiting for fish to take the bait? Just set up this drift net and relax! You'll find a cornucopia of delicious seafood on your return.

We all know the best bits stick to the bottom. Now you can scrape the oceans with the unbelievable power of the Bricksham Trawler, the only fishing net able to tow up to 50 tons of fish out from the ocean depths!
With enough practice, anyone can blow perfectly spherical glass bubbles through this blowpipe.
Do away with the lengthy glass-making process with the help of this mechanical press that can easily shape molten glass in a matter of seconds.
The first fully automatic glass-blowing machine! Owens design allows to blow fifty glass pieces simultaneously and faster than the most skilled craftsman requiring nothing but electricity!
Lend your carpenters a hand with this circular saw, but make sure they follow regulations and keep their own hands.
Equip your carpentries with this circular rip saw and watch it glide through wood, glass and metal alike.
This revolutionary electric lathe can shape wood and metal like dough, outlining perfect pieces in seconds.
This mould can shape any malleable substance into perfectly even squares and perfectly even squares only.
This hydraulic press will ensure every block has the exact required density, a guarantee of sturdy, high-quality construction materials.
No other human nor machine has ever produced faster, more solid masonry materials than this compacting molding machine.
What is a town without the golden waves of grain fields? These seeds can help you sprout at least a couple.
What is a town without the golden waves of grain fields? With these seeds, you can make it sprout anywhere.
What is a town without the golden waves of grain fields? These selected seeds will sprout beautifully wherever you sow them!
Desperate for a drink? These seeds will sprout enough hops to quench your thirst, at least a little.

Desperate for a drink? These selected seeds will sprout beautifully wherever you sow them!

Starchy problem? These sprouted potatoes will grow healthy as any endemic crop.

O, for a draught of vintage! Give these vines a few days and it will be as if they'd always been growing there.
O, for a draught of vintage! You have never seen plumper grapes than the ones that will soon weigh down these sturdy vines wherever you plant them!
Peppers don't ring a bell? Some of these seeds will become plump and delicious soon enough. Then again, some won't.
Peppers don't ring a bell? Wherever you plant these seeds, tasty vegetables will crop up.
Peppers don't ring a bell? The colossal, shiny, sweet bell peppers that will sprout from these seeds do merit a more alluring name!
Indulge your sweet tooth! These sugar saplings might not be juiciest, but they're still better than saccharin!
Indulge your sweet tooth with these syrupy sugar saplings! Or plant them and get even more!
Indulge everyone's sweet tooth! Let these premium sugar cane saplings colonise your fields and hearts with their delightful nectar!
If you need a smoke, these seeds should grow into average quality tobacco leaves.
If you need a smoke, sow these and tobacco leaves will soon puff up as if they had been there all along!
If you need a smoke, you're in luck. You've never lit up a higher quality leaf than the ones these seeds will sprout!
Dreaming of clouds of cotton? These mixed seeds are proven to result in immaculate, if slightly meagre, white fluff.
Dreaming of clouds of cotton? Sleep tight after sowing these cotton seeds. Fluffy results are guaranteed.
Dreaming of fluffy clouds of cotton? Sow these selected cotton seeds and watch as heaven arises from the earth!
Cocoa cravings? Plant these raw cacao beans and get some nibs!
Cocoa cravings? Spread the joy of chocolate wherever you go with these cacao beans!
Cocoa cravings? You won't be able to stop nibbling on the exquisite fruit these cacao beans will grow!
Can't bounce back without caoutchouc? Plant these saplings of this sappy tree wherever you need it.
Can't bounce back without caoutchouc? These caoutchouc saplings will make the ductile material flow anywhere you plant them.
Can't bounce back without caoutchouc? Get tacky rivers of white gold flowing from these superior caoutchouc saplings!
Having trouble waking up without caffeine? Take these coffee beans with you and never miss a cup.
Having trouble waking up without caffeine? Bring your population back to life with these coffee beans.
Having trouble waking up without caffeine? Export the fragrant, delicious pungency of these select coffee beans to put a toasted full stop on morning drowsiness.
If you're feeling corny, bring these mixed corn seeds with you to grow the golden tidbits.
If you're feeling corny, plant these seeds and watch them become a steady supply of shiny ears of corn.
Are you feeling corny? Plant these selected corn seeds and soon you will be buried in mountains of sweet golden kernels!

Bluehead's avant-garde torpedo will revolutionise your naval offensive with its compressed air underwater propelling and its precise explosive warhead thanks to its gyroscopic course-correction system.
Effective as ever, these mortars can be mounted onto your ship to bombard your enemies from above with explosive shells.
These cranes will lift the burden off your shipwrights shoulders and greatly hasten the shipbuilding process.
Your shipwrights will have all they need to repair your ship in the midst of the battle with these portable set of ship repairing tools.
Nicknamed Lucky Charm by the 3rd Brigade, stories of the great victories that followed after he operated the turrets precede him, infusing his comrades with a sense of invincibility.
Spread the battle rage throughout your ranks with the acoustic amplifying power of this megaphone.
Knows everything about the potato.
The backbone of civilization.
Universal eaters, eaten universally.
No painted horses this time.
Tranquil giants with an eternal memory of their home.
Worth the five men it took to catch.
Speak softly and carry a big stick.
The movement entrusts you part of their territory.
One sheep, two sheep, three sheep ...
Notes about a mysterious land far away.
A symbol of luck for the gullible.

From the high peaks of the New World, these animals showed adaptation to its rocky escarpments and cloud forests. The alpaca and its cousins, for example, have become friends to the human inhabitants of the region, with whom they have worked as pack animals for centuries.

The forest creatures of the taiga— a cold northern coniferous forest. Understanding animals that are able to survive the long harsh winters on very little, encourages your people to show restraint in their own consumption.

Not only do these fabled creatures exist, but in your hospitality have the chance to evade permanent extinction! That the tales are true will surely appeal to the romantic notions of writers in your city.
Creatures of the abyss, these ocean killers you would not want to meet on equal terms. Your aquaria of marine predators can educate your people about submarine animal behaviour.
Originating from the rainforest basin, the vivid colours of these animals are without equivalent in the Old World. It shall no doubt serve as inspiration to fashions in your city.
The barren-looking deserts of the Polar region are in fact bustling with white fur and feathers. The sight of such a miscellany should encourage more people to take up exploration.

The exotic fauna endemic to the eastern subcontinent, as encountered through the ages by merchants on the Silk Road. This display will no doubt attract similarly wealthy visitors from afar, perhaps even their exotic gifts!
While these farm animals may seem nothing special to most visitors, there still remains a lot to learned about breeding and caring for our domestic species.
To see the variety of animals living along the Great Coral Reef is extremely educational for young children, who, amused by the dolphins, better understand the complexities of life.

The full splendour of the ancient southern empire, known for buildings and infrastructure far ahead of their time. Recovering their history can better inform modern construction, and encourage your people to contribute more towards thier city.
The haunting funerary remains of a mysterious New World civilisation, unearthed for the public. A go-to destination for any leading figure hoping to be enchanted.
The first steps our ancestors took through the wildness of prehistory, on display to the public. Likely to help recover basic understanding of resource-gathering for survival.
The golden age of piracy, and all the adventures that came with it. The romance of that fading age is likely to win the hearts of your sailors.
The distinctive religious architecture and mythological inscriptions left by the ancient citystates of the Aegean. Your people will soon want their famous tragedies to play in theatres.
The colossal ruined cities of stone hidden beneath the canopy of the New World jungle. Learning more about these civilisations may help you to discover the long lost golden city.
Ceremonial objects of the nordic culture that once spread fear and destruction along the shores of the Old World. Their skill at war, and fearlessness may inspire your own forces.
Ground-breaking geological discoveries that put into question our very origins! Serving as an open university, your museum's revelations may result in reduced attendances at church.

A protohistorical civilization from the north west of the Old World, known for its stone circles and magical forests. The inherent beauty of your quarries and forests may now finally sink in for the exhibition's visitors.

The Cordillera Park in your zoo inspires your Farmers and Jornaleros to use alpacas in their daily work.
The Taiga Forest Park in your zoo encourages your people to show moderation in their food consumption.
The Extinct Species Park in your zoo inspires creative writers in your city. They will regularly ask for your help.
The Ocean Predators Park in your zoo teaches your people a lot about marine animal behaviour.
The Rainforest Park animals in your zoo inspire new colorful decorative pattern in your city.
The Frozen North Park in your zoo promotes the vocation of exploration among your people.
The Eastern Jungle Park in your zoo attracts rich merchants from afar.
The Farm Animal Park teaches your people domestic animal care and breeding.
The Great Coral Reef Park in your zoo educates children and increases the happiness of workers and artisans.
The Empire of the Eagle Exhibition in your museum inspires your people to build safer architecture and pay higher taxes.
The New World Huaca Exhibition in your museum attracts leading figures fond of esotericism to your city.
The Origin of Mankind Exhibition in your museum reminds your people of ancestral techniques for resource gathering.
The Skull and Bones Exhibition in your museum converted your sailors to piracy.
The Aegean Culture Exhibition in your museum promoted classical literature, and your theatres now perform ancient tragedies creating high attractiveness.
The Lost Cities Exhibition in your museum contains clues about a legendary city of gold. Merchants will sometimes return from the legendary city with gold.
The Northern Sagas Exhibition in your museum fills your people with a warlike spirit, which empowers your military.
The Jurassic Exhibition in your museum abandons creationism in favour of evolutionary theory, with life-sized specimens!
The Bronze Age Exhibition reminds the beauty of natural landscapes like quarries and forests to your people and visitors.
Rumour has it that hostile ships are on the route this expedition will take.
In the taverns sailors whisper strange stories about stranger things happening in this part of the world.
It seems likely we will encounter foreign cultures on the expedition ahead.
You overhear several mates regaling stories of flourishing wildlife in the expedition ahead.
The Admiralty advise that we prepare for diseases on this expedition.
It seems that only battle-seasoned sailors apply for this expedition. We ought to expect some hand-to-hand combat.
This area of the world is completely unknown to our sailors. We should prepare for some difficult navigation.

The island Prosperity appears the cause of all your father's troubles. He was accused of selling it toIsabel Sarmento, leader of an independence movement. Despite her opposition to Queen and Empire, Sir Archibald believes that if her hideout can be found, it is possible she may be willing to co-operate.
We received news of a maritime accident, it is our duty to rescue who and what we can!
The Admiralty has exposed the whereabouts of some pesky pirates who terrorize the area.
Crazy Description of Test Expedition containing unresistable teasers
This expedition is used to test a specific event.
Lady Faithful asks you to secure a foothold in the Arctic, from which you can begin your search for her husband Sir John.
Finding the Prosperity selling contract is crucial to prove that your father had no part in it.

NEW ARTICLE!
This article still needs a headline and text.
FIRST FARMERS LAND

Farmers flock to join [Participants Current Profile CompanyName], hoping to prosper from the earth as they always have done. At least at first, there will be little time for naps behind the haystack as the new settlement begins to find its feet...
FIRST WORKERS CLOCK IN

First workers bustle into [Participants Current Profile CompanyName], trading in sleepy ploughs for a bright industrial future. A bold new era begins as the furnaces are lit, plumes of smoke issue from chimney stacks, and workers don the grim and gritty garb of the factories.
FIRST ARTISANS DRIFT IN

New Artisan arrivals add culture and sophistication to [Participants Current Profile CompanyName], exhibiting much-needed flair and flourish. Gauzy fabrics and perfume enswathe this troupe of motley individualists. See the special pull-out within entitled "Herding Cats."
FIRST ENGINEERS ENGAGED

First Engineers bring discovery to the city! Books, telescopes and chemicals under their arms, they arrive in uniformed rows, peering over spectacles at their new habitat. Their welcome rationality is sure to trigger a sharp upturn in efficiency and advancement.
FIRST INVESTORS BREEZE IN

First Investors arrive! Umbrellas tap on the pavement and capacious top hats devour hatstands – the elite are finally here! The markets are expected to see major growth in the coming weeks, with share prices already soaring. For a list of potential investments, see finance pp. 14-17.
NEW COMPANY TAKES ROOT!

[Participants Current Profile CompanyName] settles first island! Hopes abound that this seed will germinate into a great leafy tree, boughs heavy with golden fruit! In historic edition, we profile company pioneer, and enjoy the positivity – who knows if we shall see its like again!
COMPANY SETTLES IN TROPICS

[Participants Current Profile CompanyName] settles first island in the new world. Sticky financial climate at first, but refreshing cloudbursts forecast! Previously uninhabited island to act as initial HQ for overseas business in waters hitherto uncharted!
DARING EXPANSION!

[Participants Current Profile CompanyName] incorporates new territory in bold move! Hopes for splendid new settlement arise! Uninhabited island meets with humankind for the first time, as company brings this secluded idyll into the fold.
COMPETITOR SETTLES ISLAND

One of our competitors has settled a new island in the region, according to reports. It is hard to determine whether this will spur on our own enterprise, but at the least it serves as a reminder of the challenge for resources our people face.
ISLAND OF OPPORTUNITY?

Previously uncharted island found! The uninhabited spot is full of promise, say surveyors, who were among the first to wade up the beach this morning alongside excited cartographers, botanists and investors keen to sniff the place out.
FRIEND OR FOE?

New competitors appear from beyond our borders have us brimming with anticipation. Will they be naughty, will they be nice? Will they bring us fish-tails, bird eggs or mice? Our foreign correspondent digs up more juicy morsels concerning our new neighbours pp.17-18.
A NEW REGION DISCOVERED!

[Participants Current Profile CompanyName] has discovered a new region overseas, and is already going about the business of gathering the necessary to establish an outpost there. For those wishing to see the world, there has never been such a time as now, apply at once within!
NEW HAVEN!

[Participants Current Profile CompanyName] discover new clutch of islands close to home, and is rumoured already to be considering investing time and resources there. Keen to seek your fortune in faraway places? Speculative applications welcome!
NEW ARCHIPELAGO!

[Participants Current Profile CompanyName] has discovered a new clutch of islands overseas, and is rumoured already to be considering investing time and resources there. Keen to seek your fortune in faraway places? Speculative applications welcome!
ANOTHER LEVEL!

[Participants Current Profile CompanyName] soaring high, as recently published estimations rank our people more advanced than ever before. "I have faith our governor will sustain this exponential growth", declares monocle-wielder, "we leap like young salmon!"
RIVAL COMPANY STEPS UP
With recent key advance for our rival, we cast our eyes over the strengths and weaknesses of their company, asking whether they might pose a threat to us. Full and frank analysis pages 3-5.
LEFT IN THE DUST!

Our rival is striding away! While we like a spotty bottom are eclipsed! Let us dwell on our inferiority, carefully inspect our failings, and wonder how we might possibly catch them back up before the great race is over!
TRADE VESSEL LEAVES DRY DOCK!

Worthy trade boat leaves [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] ready for maiden voyage! Capacious hold asking to be filled to brim with riches, which naturally will be shared among loyal populace!
WARSHIP LEAVES DRY DOCK!
Proud new warship [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] on first patrol! Brave crew wished luck by loved ones, and revelling in the romance of not knowing if they'll ever come back!
VAST FLEET CONSTRUCTED!
[Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] spawns armada! To what purpose we can only hazard a guess, but whether for naval victory or merchant profit, a larger fleet must always be better!
SHIP PRODUCTION SLOWS
A lack of manpower is holding back our shipbuilding! There are plenty of jobs to be done down at the dock, but no-one seems suitable or interested enough to take up these positions.
TRADE FLEET ASSEMBLED!

[Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] spawns merchant navy! Trade must flourish, now this bright and colourful selection are dispatched with their ample tonnages, perhaps to meet with new and exotic trade partners!
NAVAL ARMADA ASSEMBLED!

[Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] spawns awe-inspiring naval armada! Of what noble victories and conquests may we now dream?! Let us rejoice, and blissfully ignore any possiblity they may be used to serve unjust causes!
A REAL STEAMER!

First ever steam vessel christened for [Participants Current Profile CompanyName]! Never more shall bad winds addle our business, or put our navy off their stride! No! Steam, stoked and screw-propellered shall surge us ever more into contention!
THE PROMISED LAND!

Settlers arrive in numbers to [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], its illustrious doors opening to reveal a shimmering utopia! Of course, if they lived here, they'd know not to expect that, but still, growth is good!
MURDEROUS EXODUS!

For masses desperately fleeing dastardly [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], life couldn't possibly be worse! That people would pack their worldly possessions and run only goes to show what dire straits the town finds itself in.
EARTHLY PARADISE!

We are as joyful as we can possibly be!' the hysterical people squeal, as they dance the euphoric streets of [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]! If there is indeed a secret recipe for happiness, our fair city must contain all the desired ingredients!
HAPPINESS AND LIGHT

[Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] is quite full of mirth! "Eight and three-fifths from ten is how I score my present feeling," one resident remarked during recent census, "yet I am not completely delirious..."
PEOPLE JUST ABOUT CONTENT

[Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] is a dull, occasionally satisfactory place to live, according to residents. Why is this town so run-of-the-mill, when it could be so very much more? We detail in full pp. 3-7 exactly what makes life here so bland...
UNHAPPY HOME!

Local hearts filled with woe in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]! Streets wet with tears, as residents weep for the neglect! "I still want to believe in this place," says one we met, "But the dream is dying!"
PEOPLE ARE FURIOUS!

Anger at living conditions in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]! Residents on verge of drastic action to end hardship! Our newspaper maintains responsibility to report the grievous situation of the people, though our livelihoods may suffer for it!
GENERAL MOOD IMPROVES!

Happier days return to [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]! Either people have learned to cope better, or indeed as this paper believes, living conditions have demonstrably improved in recent times. More grounds for domestic optimism pp. 5 & 6.
GENERAL MOOD DETERIORATES!

Mood slumps in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] as reality of living conditions hit home. Something must be done to recover this city to its former glory! With the assistance of local residents, we have compiled a long list of the most urgent improvements...
STILL NO MARKET!

The lack of fresh produce available in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] is thoroughly depressing! When will the city council see sense and provide the people the variety and bounty of a proper market?
FISH SHORTAGE!

Scarcity of fish in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] due to shameful mismanagement, leaves town in a flap. Many will have a bone to pick with the governor, unless net quantities soon improve.
SCHNAPPS SHORTAGE!

Scarcity of Schnapps in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] due to shameful mismanagement, means very essence of society may soon evaporate! Locals not sure where to turn after bottle taken away!
LACK OF DECENT CLOTHING!

Scarcity of Basic Clothes in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] due to shameful mismanagement, means very fabric of society may soon disintegrate! Many left with nothing to wear in the week, let alone Sunday best!
STILL NO PUB!

Lack of pub in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] is a jolly poor show. If there's one thing that could bring this disparate community together, it is ale, a roaring fire, and a trio of fiddlers!
WURST CASE SCENARIO!

Scarcity of sausage in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] due to shameful mismanagement leaves locals feeling raw. Worries salivating carnivores may start eyeing each other for the butcher's slab!
BREAD SHORTAGE!

Scarcity of bread in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] due to half-baked management means society may collapse in on itself. We're yet to see a single crumb of evidence in respect to a solution...
GODLESS PLACE!

With no church in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], gossip grows elsewhere that the town is cauldron of devil worship. Of course nothing could be further from the truth! But while there is no church, we shall continue to be branded with the hoof.
THE GREAT UNWASHED!

Scarcity of soap in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] due to shameful mismanagement leaves locals smelling appalling! The merest smidge of lavender and camphor would be enough for us to unclasp the clothes pegs from our probosces!
UTTERLY HOPLESS!
Scarcity of beer in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] due to shameful mismanagement means soul of society is draining away!
A TOWN OF DUNCES!

Lack of a school in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] means locals are really thick. We can but hope some sentience may emerge from this pool of ignorance, and put things to right by building one.
CANNED FOOD SHORTAGE!
Scarcity of canned food in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] due to tin-pot mismanagement leaves society feeling crushed.
SEWING MACHINES RUN OUT!
Scarcity of sewing machines in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] has town in a tangle! Settlement hoping the loose ends will be tied up soon.
LACK OF VARIETY!
Still no Variety Theatre in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]! Local poets spew bitter verse attacking the powers-that-be who would deny them even the smallest of freedoms.
RUM SHORTAGE!

Shortage of rum in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] very rum indeed! Rocky patch for rum sees locals fall from hammocks, and grey clouds fill in the sky. We petition governor to bring the sunshine back!
FUR COAT SHORTAGE!
Fur coats go missing in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]! Animal retaliation theory disproven, as town council shoulders all responsibility.
LACK OF UNIVERSITY SMARTS

Absence of University in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] makes town "provincial backwater", say scholars hoping to be institutionalised. "Without it, none of us will ever amount to anything!"
SPECTACLES!
No sign of Spectacles in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]! Locals want transparency with regard to the recent shortages, mystified by town's lack of vision.
PENNY FARTHINGS RUN OUT!
Penny Farthings disappear in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], as last few models cycle out of stock. We ask why no-one is stepping up to steer things back in the right direction.
COFFEE SHORTAGE!

What sane working person can be expected to work without coffee? Is the question we put to [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] local council, in the hope they will grind out a solution.
POCKET WATCHES RUN OUT!
Shortage of Pocket Watches in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] damaging efficiency! With time ticking on, officials are under pressure to solve the matter post-haste!
POWER CUTS!
Lack of Electricity supply throttling [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] production! Authorities charged with ensuring supply resumes quick as a flash.
LIGHT BULB SHORTAGE!
Lifespan of Light Bulbs questioned in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], as supplies run low. People hoping local council will have some bright ideas for a change.
TOWN STILL HAS NO BANK!
Continuing lack of Bank in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] has moneymen drawing on new reserves of patience, as cash spills out of bedsprings everywhere.
CHAMPAGNE RUNS DRY!
Champagne shortage in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] takes the fizz out of life. Trust in authorities put on ice, as supply continues to falter.
CIGARS STUBBED OUT!
Shortage of Cigars in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] is nothing but a headache for wealthy investors hoping to get their circulation back.
WHAT ABOUT MY MEMBERSHIP?!

Lack of a decent Members Club in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] disappoints work hard, play hard crowd, who want somewhere to crash when the financial markets do. Ties and cufflinks expected in the post pronto, or there'll be trouble!
CHOCOLATE GOBBLED UP!

Chocolate shortage in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] sends place into meltdown. Grandfathers disappoint grandchildren by hoarding it all to themselves, and licorice substitutes failing to meet with same degree of enthusiasm.
QUALITY JEWELLERY SHORTAGE

Absence of Jewellery in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] is destroying the status of the town, wealthy residents are complaining. "For lack of alternatives, I have been forced to wear family heirlooms on stage," sighed local diva.
MUSIC FADING OUT!

Gramophone shortage in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] as machines prove too popular. "Music shouldn't be this popular," rants frustrated snob, "Only those who truly know how to listen should be allowed them!"
STEAM CARRIAGE SHORTAGE!

Shortage of Steam Carriages in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] is driving everybody quite mad! Authorities need to get a grip on the wheel soon, or stymied local motorists may combust!
FRIED PLANTAIN SHORTAGE
Fried Plantains run out in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]. Cross local remarks "If I don't get my plantains fried in fish oil, I don't know what I'll do!"
PAUCITY OF PONCHOS!

Scarcity of Ponchos in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] leaves hill-dwelling locals envious of smug Alpaca. Outrage over missing supply means there is little in the way of warm fuzzy feelings.
TORTILLAS RUN OUT!

Tortillas extremely thin on the ground in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], leaving city feeling flat. "They better scoop us out of this soon, or the whole thing will leave a very bad taste in the mouth."
LACK OF PUNCH
Still no Boxing Ring in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]! Worries locals may start unregulated fight club of their own if no official venue is organised soon.
BOMBINS RUN OUT!

Scarcity of Bombins in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] highly unprofessional! "Without comfortable headwear we are lost!" says sartorial snob, his shining bald patch exposed to the elements.
BANKRUPTCY!?

[Participants Current Profile CompanyName] is in the red, and it can only be 'a matter of time before the bailiffs come' to reclaim furniture and wallpaper! This will mean the end if this disastrous venture is not turned around soon!
FINANCIAL POWERHOUSE

As positive credit balance hastens era of untold prosperity, [Participants Current Profile CompanyName] said to have Midas touch! Yes, that didn't end too well for poor old Midas, but let's not dwell on the negatives!
A POSITIVE ACCOUNT

Income is no longer in the negative for [Participants Current Profile CompanyName] according to financial analysis. "We're headed back in the right direction at least!" concedes backer, forced to come down off high horse.
BACK FROM THE RED!

[Participants Current Profile CompanyName] bounces back from bankruptcy! Accounts no longer overdrawn! "A miraculous turnaround!" prate fickle and useless advisors that likely precipitated the crisis in the first place.
STONY BROKE!

[Participants Current Profile CompanyName] plagued by prospect of bankruptcy! Accounts overdrawn! "A miraculous turnaround" required, according to fickle and useless advisors that likely precipitated the crisis in the first place.
WE ARE RICH!

[Participants Current Profile CompanyName] bounces back from bankruptcy! Accounts no longer overdrawn! "A miraculous turnaround!" prate fickle and useless advisors that likely precipitated the crisis in the first place.
HELL'S ETERNAL SLAVES!

Brutally driven from dawn 'til dusk, the tyrannised population of [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] suffer like the yoked beasts of Lucifer. City cries out for someone to rise up and put an end to its medieval overlords!
FARMERS EXPLOITED!

Dreadful working conditions persist for Farmers of [Participants Current Profile CompanyName], who have remained chained to the grindstone for this underhand and unprincipled state it seems, forever and a day. We can only hope change will come, and soon! Sign the petition!
WORKERS EXPLOITED!

Dreadful working conditions persist for Workers of [Participants Current Profile CompanyName], who have held their faces to the furnace for this underhand and unprincipled state it seems, forever and a day. We can only hope change will come, and soon! Sign the petition!
ARTISANS EXPLOITED!

Dreadful working conditions persist for Artisans of [Participants Current Profile CompanyName], who have remained chained to their trestles for this underhand and unprincipled state it seems, forever and a day. We can only hope change will come, and soon! Sign the petition!
ENGINEERS EXPLOITED!

Dreadful working conditions persist for Engineers of [Participants Current Profile CompanyName], who have remained fused to their flasks for this underhand and unprincipled state it seems, forever and a day. We can only hope change will come, and soon! Sign the petition!
JORNALEROS EXPLOITED

Dreadful working conditions persist for Jornaleros of [Participants Current Profile CompanyName], who have run themselves into the ground for this underhand and unprincipled state it seems, forever and a day. We can only hope change will come, and soon! Sign the petition!
OBREROS EXPLOITED

Dreadful working conditions persist for Obreros of [Participants Current Profile CompanyName], who have had to work their hands to dust for this underhand and unprincipled state it seems, forever and a day. We can only hope change will come, and soon! Sign the petition!
ETHICAL BUSINESS

With many on generous working terms in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], liberals and employess alike heap praise upon altruistic visionaries in charge of this most progressive city.
FARM LABOUR SHORTAGE

Lack of farmers in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] mean problems for local produce. "We need all the help we can get if the harvest is not to be a disaster," says one disgruntled local, left in the lurch.
FACTORY WORKER SHORTFALL

Lack of able workers causing problems for industry in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]. "I told the guv, I don't have the experience to work in this section alone," said one chagrined employee, wishing to remain anonymous.
LACK OF ARTISANSHIP

Too few Artisans in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] means local craft will suffer. "When I said I enjoyed the isolation, I didn't imagine being forever alone..." weeps beleaguered local dandy, hand upon brow.
SHORTAGE OF RELIABLE ENGINEERS

Not enough Engineers in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] to keep city in good working order, says survey. "It's terrible, the lack of investment in further research," pencil-chewing curiosity remarks. More bad science, pp. 19-20.
TOO FEW INVESTORS!

A lack of investment in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] is extremely damaging for the local economy, financial report shows. "It's a damned farce," was the only comment we could extract from those who had already given their backing in the region.
JORNALEROS TOO FEW

Jornaleros workforce dwindles in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], with even the old guard admitting they need some fresh blood. "Alpaca will not do all this work, she'll give up, run back to the foothills," fears overburdened local.
SHORTAGE OF OBREROS

Obreros are too few in number to keep their visioon of the future alive in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]. "This place, is too much in the past. When will we grow and move on?" says earnest and principled resident.
EAGER FIRST VISITORS ARRIVE!

As first visitors arrive in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], there is belief that town can quickly become a popular destination for tours and excursions, and that its many features and amenities can have a lasting appeal.
VISITORS FLOODING IN!

Visitor numbers surge in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], as delirious sightseers rush to unprise the holiday purse, and pour much-needed revenue into our beloved city. Local businesses must be thriving!
VISITORS VANISH!

Visitors desert [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] in favour of more attractive destinations. "We just aren't getting anywhere near as much trade this season," tour operator laments. Is our city really that ugly? Full assessment p. 23.
SPECIAL GUEST COMES BEARING GIFT!

Distinguished guest gifts generously to fabulous [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], stating "rarely have I seen such pleasant and thriving urbs, in all my years of travel, the honour is all mine..."
GOD'S OWN COUNTRY

Splendid [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] is now the most visited island in existence. It is a beacon of hope, a torch of progress, a paragon of hospitality! Long may it be overrun with tourists!
TOWN IS FIREPROOF!
Fire likelihood next to nought in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]! Feverish citizens revel in asbestos arcadia, their only fire, a fire of the soul!
NO SMOKE WITHOUT FIRE

Chance of fire in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] "Irresponsibly high", said despairing fire safety committee following thorough inspections of business and residential premises,"all it takes is one match..."
FIRE ERUPTS!

As small fire breaks out in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], fears multiply it could become an all-consuming inferno! "It's about time we had a great fire," says bystander, "I mean.. it would be terrible of course..."
CITY LEFT TO BURN!

Fire guts part of [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], locals rage at failure of local authority to act. A few more buckets of water for example, and there may have been something salvaged from the blaze.
FIRESTORM PASSES

Fire died out of its own accord in [Newspaper SelectedNewspaper Article([RefGuid]) Context TownName]. There is relief mingled with inquiry as to why the conflagration was allowed to take hold in first place.
FIRE EXTINGUISHERS!

Firemen do their service proud in [Newspaper SelectedNewspaper Article([RefGuid]) Context TownName], let us never take their sacrifice for granted. "It was only a small fire," says brave fire chief, "I'll tackle worse 'ere the day I die."
SPECIAL MANOEUVRES QUASH FIRE
Singular heroics smother any chance of further fire in [Newspaper SelectedNewspaper Article([RefGuid]) Context TownName], as local authorities act swiftly and decisively to snuff out the blaze.
BLISTERING INFERNO!
Fire becomes inferno in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]! As Satanic fire and brimstone erupts to consume our city of sin! See p. 3 for full disclosure of damaged districts.
ASHEN WASTELAND!

Inferno utterly guts [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], "the city is damned!" croaks broken local, who like many others, has seen their life story disappear in towering columns of smoke.
DAMAGE IS DONE

As horrific inferno finally dies out in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] there is little consolation for residents, whose lives have been laid waste. "No-one took action!" coughs young mother, "left us for dead!"
BLAZING HEROES!

Inferno flushed out by fearless fire brigade! Fires of passion swell for smoking-hot daredevils, saviours of [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], who appeared in fine red uniforms at ceremony held in their honour.
SPECIAL FORCE THWARTS INFERNO!

Emergency procedure saves [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] from complete incineration by recent inferno! Authorities praised for their handling of the situation, which many believed was beyond hope of rescue!
LAKE OF BLISSFUL CALM

Chance of widescale uprising in delightfully harmonious [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], as likely as 'winged chimps flying to the moon', say aristocrats confident that not a whiff of popular feeling exists there.
BLOODY REVOLUTION IMMINENT!

People of [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] 'hell-bent on unleashing era of terror', says man who witnessed others polishing pitchforks. Our paper considers it a duty to report injustice seriously, and will stand behind the common folk should they have fair grievance!
RIOT SPELLS TROUBLE

Local riot in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] is first raindrop foreshadowing "flood of revolution", worries politician. "The lower classes must be trampled back down, or society as we know it will be destroyed," he concedes.
CITY DAMAGED AFTER RIOT

Authorities take blame for inaction in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] as riot leaves city in tatters. What was at first regarded as a storm in a teacup, has now resulted in a burned lap!
UPRISING FIZZLES OUT

Riot in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] ends. Administration fortunate that concerns of populous have subsided naturally, but for how long will the lid remain on the simmering pot?
ORDER RESTORED!

Riotous spasm is easily quelled in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], local governor expresses relief that deterrents are working. Authorities put radicals back in their place, see pp. 3-5 for full account of how supremacy was achieved.
RIOT STOPPED AT SOURCE!

Dedicated riot measures prevent further spread of dangerous ideology in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]! Authorities praised for containing leftist protests with ruthless precision!
VOLCANO OF VIOLENCE!

Cataclysmic revolution in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]! Small dribble of discontent becomes pyroclastic flow of public fury! Theme of the century continues, as full-scale rebellion grips the streets.
REVOLT LEAVES BLOODY THORNS

Any relief that the ugly great revolt has ended is overshadowed by doubt of whether damaged city will ever be the same again. This is not a matter of a few smashed windows, there is widespread damage for the city to contend with, not to mention lingering bad feeling.
REVOLT ENDS, OR DOES IT?

Bloody revolt subsides, but have its sea of angry voices merely gone into hiding? Do the terrifying dissidents wait for the perfect moment to renew their protesting, more suddenly and violently than ever before?
REVOLUTION AVERTED!

Crowds of delinquent demonstrators convinced to leave the streets of [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] by well-prepared local authorities. An air of calm is said to have been essential in keeping the deep line of ruffians at bay. Full report pp 2-7.
REVOLTERS PICKED OFF!

Special government intervention rescues [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] from the unshakeable madness of revolution! Town treated for especially virulent strain of radicals, whom the authorities deftly managed to isolate!
THE PICTURE OF HEALTH!

Disease "extraordinarily low" in fit-as-a-fiddle [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], as medical experts ponder the phenomenon. Whether a cold bath in the morning or a diet of only sprouts, something must be keeping the doctor away!
EVE OF EPIDEMIC!

Disease chance high in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]! New 'black death' purportedly descending! Will 'invisible killer' manifest in pus-filled buboes across the abdomen? Yellow, red and blue fever? Or perhaps honeycombing of the face?!
OUTBREAK!

Disease grips [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]! Calls to flush locality of foul air, close schools, even forego Sunday service! Check your symptoms, pp 2-7, but be warned, the graphic descriptions that lie therein are not for the faint of heart!
SPECTRE OF SICKNESS LINGERS

Illness in [Newspaper SelectedNewspaper Article([RefGuid]) Context TownName] abates, but leaves affected districts drained of life. "I feel a ghost of my former self" moans figure still swaddled in bedsheet.
HOPES AND PRAYERS

Disease in [Newspaper SelectedNewspaper Article([RefGuid]) Context TownName] abates before it becomes more serious— thank heavens. Locals ascribe recovery to angels watching over them, and having escaped criticism, the prayers of the authorities must have been answered too!
OUTBREAK REMEDIED

Districts given the all clear in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], as brave doctors and nurses do fine job with the equipment and resources they have. "Plenty of rest is all you need for a tickle in the throat."
INFECTION ISOLATED!

Success, as special measures are taken to curb further infection in [Newspaper SelectedNewspaper Article([RefGuid]) Context TownName]. "We are lucky a cure for this sickness has already been discovered!" says grateful convalescent.
EPIDEMIC!

Putrefying epidemic ravages [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]! Victims contort with agony! Malefic miasma threatens the entire species! Doctors desperately rummaging through cabinets for anything they can find to numb feelings of personal failure...
GHASTLY PLAGUE ENDS
Epidemic ends, but leaves [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] in state of decay. "There are still crosses on the doors, and inside… it's medieval," laments stretcher-bearer.
ACUTE CASE OF APATHY!

As vicious epidemic finally relents in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], citizens bemoan lack of official intervention that may have prevented it entirely. "Left to our own devices!" says angry woman holding rusty forceps.
MIRACLE CURE!
[Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] returns to full health once more, as residents declare [Participants Current Profile CompanyName] patron saint of the sick and infirm!
THE PERFECT ANTIDOTE!
Special measures ensure [Newspaper SelectedNewspaper Article([RefGuid]) Context TownName] epidemic is neutralised at its epicentre, a triumph of modern medicine!
LOW RISK OF EXPLOSIONS

Safety inspections in [Newspaper SelectedNewspaper Article([RefGuid]) Context TownName] show that town industry is unlikely to experience too many blow-outs. "The possibility always remains," inspector remarks, "while the accompanying science is still in its infancy."
HIGH CHANCE OF EXPLOSION!

Haphazard management of industry in [Newspaper SelectedNewspaper Article([RefGuid]) Context TownName] means a catastrophic blow-out is "likely", according to quivering investigator, "we are dabbling in what we don't understand!"
CATASTROPHIC EXPLOSION!

Roof blows off industrial heart of [Newspaper SelectedNewspaper Article([RefGuid]) Context TownName]! Tremendous boom precedes widespread destruction by fire, as something goes terribly, terribly wrong in one of its factories, with lack of council foresight blamed.
WORLD FAIR FOUNDATIONS BUILT!
World fair foundations complete! [Participants Current Profile CompanyName] ready for global prominence!
WONDER ENTERS NEW PHASE!

Work has begun on the next stage of construction of the World Fair in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], and to great excitement! If crowds are gathering only to witness the construction, imagine how many will flock to its opening!
WONDER COMPLETES STAGE!

Opening day of World Fair edges ever-closer in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] as significant chapter in the construction ends. Clear progress is being made, and it is all very exciting.
WORLD FAIR PROGRESSING SMOOTHLY

Magnificent monument in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] "firmly on track" to have ribbon cut on expected date, remarks building's architect, "great things take time, we had expected that."
WORLD'S FAIR BID STALLS

Significant delays plague [Participants Current Profile CompanyName] in the construction of its World Fair. People of [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] grumble it is pork barrel politics, amid fears city may be overreaching.
WORLD FAIR AT A STANDSTILL!

Desperate concern for World's Fair complex in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] after construction is unexpectedly halted. Many already calling the project a white elephant—goodness knows what they shall make of the venture now.
MONUMENTAL ACHIEVEMENT!

World Fair opens in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]. [Participants Current Profile CompanyName] is proud new owner of the venue, achieving a feat we would never have imagined at the start of this extraordinary century!
ARCHITECTURAL EXPOSITION OPEN!

Celebration of architecture opens to visitors at World Fair in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]! Neo-classicist, Gothic, Romanesque—muse upon the themes of the age, behold all variety of decor-ornamentation, be inspired! Plan of the show floor p.17.
ARCHITECTURAL EXHIBITION ENDS

As delicious architectural pageant closes in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], designers and planners everywhere wax poetic over the event—"A triumph of modern collaborations", "a treasure trove for planners", "Civic inspiration!"
TOMORROW'S WORLD!

Scientific extravaganza opens to public in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]! World Fair presents its most novel exhibition; a bizarre futurescape; vast displays of mechanical apparatus, the brainchildren of the world's foremost innovators!
FUTURE APPEARS BRIGHT

Though miraculous exhibition of science has sadly ended in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], every visitor left positively charged! All agreed their eyes had been opened to the remarkable possibilities that lie ahead of us!
EXHIBITION OF HUMAN HISTORY!

The past comes to life in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]! Bewildering paleoethnoanthroarcheologistic discoveries see light of day after centuries dormant! Open the cabinet of curiosity! Drawer after drawer of meticulously-categorised finds!
CURTAIN FALLS ON FASCINATING PAST

As celebrated archaeological exhibition closes in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], visitors chime in agreement over its success. To have gained so much, both in spirit and tangibly from the past, has helped us understand our place in time better than ever.
HOPEFULS DEPART!

An expedition is officially underway, after months poring over maps and gathering the necessary expertise! Magnificent crew have spring in step according to the Captain, let us hope their enthusiasm will help them prevail!
RAPTUROUS RETURN!

Expedition achieves the unthinkable, as crew surmount innumerable obstacles and reach their goal! "It is the longest tale, a fable of the sea… of monsters real, and imagined, of—" the proud Captain began, before we cut him off. A great crowd was present to cheer them home.
DISASTROUS VOYAGE!

Expedition goes terribly awry! Despair as expedition ship returns in bits, its crew mad and mutinous! Perhaps it is better we do not know what took place aboard the fateful voyage, for we could never fully understand the horror of it all!
SHINING TALENT LOST!

A specialist has become the latest casualty of the ill-fated expedition whose crew left port not so long ago with hope in their hearts, and dreams of all the great wonders of the world. The only wonder now is whether any of the poor fools will return.
Ship sold
The [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context ObjectName] was sold to [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context ParticipantName]
Ship bought!
The [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context ObjectName] was bought from [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context ParticipantName]
ALLIANCE OF CIVILISED NATIONS!

A firm alliance between proud nations has been achieved! The new partnership is set to be of vast importance to the immediate, even long-term futures of both sides. The final deal was mooted and passed under the noses, and more importantly, pens of the diplomatic suits in record time—
ALLIANCE STRATEGICALLY DISSOLVED!

"The decision does not mean our ongoing relations need turn nasty," was the official statement on cancelled alliance with [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context ParticipantName], and "no reason" why "alliance wouldn't be possible again in the future."
LEFT IN THE LURCH!

Key alliance breaks down! With former ally [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context ParticipantName] providing no answers, officials left to speculate the reason they withdrew support. It is unclear how this disappointing news has been received at the highest level.
NEW TRADE PARTNER!

A profitable new partnership with [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context ParticipantName]! Our correspondent furnishes us with the latest figures, and trumpets the immediate economic gains from the deal.
TRADE AGREEMENT DROPPED

Future plans do not include trade with [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context ParticipantName], if the rumours are to be believed. Who benefits the most from the decision? More perspective on the economic landscape on page 12!
TRADE SNUBBED!

[Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context ParticipantName] severs trade ties in shock for local business! What might have been a fruitful relationship comes to cruelly to an end, as partner reneges on promises. Sharp decline in economy forecasted with steep-looking graphs on page 4.
THE WAR IS OVER!

Peace at last! [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context ParticipantName] signs treaty! Ambassadors return from the negotiating table with olive branch, white doves rise to the skies, children skip gladly through meadows. The war is over! Let the colour return to our cheeks!
A REPRIEVE FROM THE VIOLENCE!

A ceasefire has been agreed. Whether moved to act by the destruction, or the strategic value of a pause, matters not. Wounds can now be licked, the situation reappraised, and perhaps, peace may be contemplated. The leaders of forces on both sides are said to be content with the situation.
WILL THE WAR NEVER END?!

"No," say Admirals as conflict resumes following a period of ceasefire. Navies muster, sailors polish their cannons, powder is poured from kegs as the parties re-enter the pugilist's ring for another round. When will this needless bloodshed cease?!
WAR DECLARED!

The powers that be have elected to go to war! Recruitment has already begun, lives at stake to uphold our values, to preserve unity and order, to meet danger half-way with zealous alacrity. Time will tell if it is a choice founded on wisdom.
WAR IS DECLARED ON US!

[Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context ParticipantName] declares war! Peace and humanity desert us, as Mephistophelian adversary rises from the depths to confront us! We can only trust in our bravest to fight back this nemesis, and drive ruination from our shores.
PROPPING UP EACH OTHER

An alliance has formed between two of our rivals. Speculation mounts as to what they may be up to. Of course, their intentions could be perfectly chivalrous, but while any doubt remains, speculation of the more ignoble variety shall no doubt stir in the pool.
UNFRIENDED

An alliance between our rivals has broken down. In the following days, rumour is likely to gather as to that which broke the spell between them. It is unknown for example, whether this development will be seen positively or negatively here. More to follow.
COMMERCE GROWS OVERSEAS
New agreements reached among our neighbours this forenoon—more details in today's Foreign Diplomacy, Trade and Things You Should Care About But Won't column.
OVERSEAS TRADE INSTABILITY

A trade agreement between rival powers has been cancelled. It seems they no longer saw eye-to-eye on the subject. Whether the boom of this minor diplomatic eruption will reach our shores remains to be seen.
ENTENTE CORDIALE

A peace treaty between rivals overseas has finally been kissed with a seal. Perhaps this grand gesture can seed a future of peace and progress. Or perhaps such wimpish withdrawals are symptomatic of this too-liberal age!
WAR BETWEEN RIVALS SUSPENDED

A truce has been established between our neighbours. Pious hearts, non-partisans, will be glad that for a time, the suffering does not have to continue. How long will empathy last? Hortense McGough remarks upon the situation from the place of amnesty.
RIVAL WAR RESUMES

A ceasefire has ended between two of our neighbours, meaning that it cannot be long before the first shot rings out into the night, and their forces are on top of one another once again. Let us hope the same winds of war do not blow this way. Full report pages 31-37.
RIVAL WAR BREAKS OUT

Our neighbours have declared war on one another. An intercepted telegram confirmed the news, which many believe had been brewing for some time - now the line is crossed, the dam burst! No reason for us to react however - neutrals should dissemble and play dumb!
BACK FROM THE DEAD!

Pirate nuisance returns, disproving reports they had been wiped out! Hidden coves making motley, pestilential denizens of the black flag hard to sniff out. Let us hope it is only a matter of time before these skeletons of the last century go under for good!
RELATIONS SOUR

Diplomatic relations with [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context ParticipantName] have "deteriorated" recently, say disgruntled ambassadors, as "consequence of innate differences between us". We hope importance of maintaining good relations with neighbours is not being overlooked.
RELATIONSHIP BRIGHTENS!

Relations with [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context ParticipantName] have improved recently, say jovial ambassadors! Glasses clinked, and trays of finely-wrought chocolate pralines did circulate, as improved standing with our counterparts called for celebration.
NON-AGGRESSION PACT
Reliable partnership with [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context ParticipantName] deepened with new contract.
DEEPER BONDS!
[Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context ParticipantName] signs non aggression pact with another player.
LIKE LAMBS TO THE SLAUGHTER!

Many ships lost! Naval defeats follow with painful frequency, as calamitous maneuvers and decisions show weakness in leadership. Admiral first sealord asked for comment, but wiping tear from corner of his eye, he would only put his palm to his heart and solemnly sing the anthem.
OUR HOME CRUMBLES!

So many fine buildings lost to destruction! City ravaged by war! Architects frantically unroll emergency plans to rebuild as violence continues. Many parts of the city are unrecognisable! Full scale of devastation sketched out by our artist-at-the-scene Henri Dugarry...
ENEMY STAMPEDING OUR CITIES!

Enemy makes mockery of our defences, seizing several key trading posts! Embarassing lack of prowess in war likely to spell the end, if wholesale changes to our forces are not undertaken soon! Revel in full scale of devastation as covered throughout today's edition.
NAVAL POWER!

We have sunk countless ships— proof of titanic fortitude in the face of enemy aggression! As the waves swim red with the blood of our foe, whisky shoots from the nostrils of our admirals as they guffaw with laughter! More on the genius minds behind our navy below.
DIRECT HIT!
Enemy structures crumble under fire! The crashes, bangs, and rumbles paralyse the enemy! Praise for our brave forces, and their ruthless expertise in demolition!
SEA BATTLE CAPTIVATES THE PEOPLE
